summary: Agile-Scale is an argonian that completed the dawnguard quest, the dragonborn one and only needs to defeat Alduin.
descriptionHtml:
Hey there, this is the first time I uploaded a file to nexus mods so please don't be hard on me. Also sorry if there is a lot of mod requirement.....I really wanted the best.

Needs Dragonborn DLC, Hearthfire DLC, Dawnguard DLC

Be sure to have Skse or some mods will not work correctly and please open your game as admin if you want Familiar Faces to work and also use the skse launcher.

NOTE: Be sure to check the chest in the main room under the stairs of the Lakeview manor, you'll find all the items I collected.

Mods used in this save
Adobe PLayer homes 
-Routa stormcloak and warrior cabin Routa
-Sjel Blad Castle 

Companion creatures
-Amaterasu the great spirit
-Doge reborn

Companion others
-Inigo
-Sofia the funny fully voiced follower

Followers
-Faallokaar The loyal voiced dragon and human follower
-Familair Faces
-Wolf Follower

Gameplay effects
-Hearthfire Multiple adoption 

Magic Spells And enchantments 
-Midas magic evolved

Mercantiles (shops Stores inns taverns)
-Increased merchant stocks
-Kankaraya
-Windstad mine

Modders resource and tutorial
-JContainers

Npc
-Adoptable argonian hatchling
-Khajiit child Maisha
-My little hatchling Ram-Ku-Argonian boy

Races classes and birthsigns
-Grimoas Plantigrade Feet For Beast Race

User interfaces
-Race menu
-SkyUI

Weapons
-Inuyasha Weapons revamp everything you need

And thats about it

If you would like some changes inside the save, be sure to get rid of the mod related items in their own shops just to be safe, 
To uninstall those mods be sure to look What the other mods need To be sure that it won't crash
Hope you have a ''safe'' and fun game

Versions- all updated using NMM
author: Krystel14
